title: Pixel 4 xl and the proximity sensor active edge and tap to wake is not working
content: I have a pixel 4 xl and the proximity sensor, active edge and tap to wake is not working. It worked after flashing back to October firmware and after getting the OTA for the February update and updated it worked for an hour then it stopped again . I have already rebooted a lot of times and did a factory reset but it still persists...
